# Repository Instructions for GitHub Copilot

## Project Context

This is the website repository for jasonmhead.com. It serves as the personal website and portfolio for Jason M. Head.

## General Guidelines

- Follow modern web development best practices
- Ensure all changes are accessible and follow WCAG guidelines
- Optimize for performance and SEO
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Test changes thoroughly before committing

## Code Style

- Use consistent formatting and indentation
- Write descriptive commit messages
- Keep functions and components focused and single-purpose
- Comment complex logic and business rules

## Security

- Never commit sensitive information (API keys, passwords, tokens)
- Validate and sanitize all user inputs
- Follow OWASP security guidelines
- Keep dependencies up to date

## Documentation

- Update README.md when making significant changes
- Document new features and functionality
- Include usage examples where applicable
- Keep documentation in sync with code changes

## Testing

- Write tests for new functionality when applicable
- Ensure existing tests pass before committing
- Include both unit and integration tests where appropriate

## Before Committing

- Review all changes carefully
- Ensure no sensitive data is included
- Verify that the changes work as expected
- Run any applicable linters or formatters
